title: Tempura vegetables with teriyaki & pickled cucumber

ingredients.item: 140g pack Waitrose Teriyaki Sauce (find in the fruit and veg chiller)

instructions.step: Make ribbons from the cucumber using a vegetable peeler, discarding the seeds. Mix together the rice vinegar, sugar and ginger and stir until the sugar dissolves. Toss with the cucumber ribbons and set aside to marinate for at least 30 minutes.

Heat the oil to 180°C in a deep fryer or large saucepan. Mix together the tempura mix and nori sprinkle, then whisk in the ice-cold water to form a smooth batter. Dip the vegetables in the batter, shaking off any excess to thinly coat, then deep fry, in small batches, for 3-4 minutes or until golden. Drain on kitchen paper and keep warm.
Heat the teriyaki sauce according to pack instructions. Serve the tempura vegetables with the pickled cucumber and the teriyaki sauce for dipping.
